mapper.select: SELECT A.i_board, A.thumImage, A.title, A.price, A.r_dt as r_dt, SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.addr," ",3) AS addr FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_board, COUNT(*) AS likeNum FROM t_board_like GROUP BY i_board ) B ON A.i_board = B.i_board ORDER BY B.likeNum DESC, r_dt DESC LIMIT 12

SELECT A.i_board, A.thumImage, A.title, A.price, A.r_dt, SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.addr," ",3) AS addr FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.addr," ",2) in (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(B.addr," ",2) FROM t_user WHERE B.i_user = ${i_user}) ORDER BY A.r_dt DESC LIMIT 12
SELECT A.i_board, A.thumImage, A.title, A.price, A.r_dt, SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.addr," ",3) AS addr FROM t_board A ORDER BY A.r_dt DESC LIMIT 12

SELECT A.i_board, A.thumImage, A.title, A.price, A.r_dt, SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.addr," ",3) AS addr, B.likeNum, A.i_cg FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_board, COUNT(*) AS likeNum FROM t_board_like GROUP BY i_board ) B ON A.i_board = B.i_board WHERE A.i_cg = #{i_cg} ORDER BY B.likeNum DESC, r_dt DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT A.i_board, A.thumImage, A.title, A.price, A.r_dt, SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.addr," ",3) AS addr FROM t_board A WHERE A.price = 0 ORDER BY A.r_dt DESC LIMIT 12

WHERE A.i_cg = #{i_cg}
